full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Title
Modification or Advance Exchange of Two Honeywell SG-811 Symbol Generators

### Reference Information
* Reference Number: PW-22-01008610
* Solicitation Number: T8493-22-0015(1)
* Amendment Number: 1
* Notice of Publication Date: 2022-09-28
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-25T14:00:00

### Tender Details
* Tender Status: Expired
* Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): JX1680
	+ Description: Aircraft Accessories and Components (Military) - Repair and Overhaul
* North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code: None
* Procurement Category: SRVTGD
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: None
* Regions of Opportunity: Unspecified
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity
* Contracting Entity: Transport Canada
* Address: 330 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0N5, Canada
* Contracting Officer: Tanya Nadeau
	+ Contact Information: 
		- Phone: 343-575-6684
		- Email: tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca

### Tender Documentation
* Tender Description:
	+ Transport Canada has a requirement for the modification or advance exchange of two Honeywell SG-811 Symbol Generators, in accordance with the Work identified at Annex A Statement of Work.
	+ The period of the contract is from the date of contract award to December 15th, 2022, inclusive.
* Tender Documents:
	+ [Files attached to the notice URL]
